gameDetails.name: Tzolk'in: The Mayan Calendar â€“ Tribes & Prophecies: Ek Chuah
gameDetails.description:
A new tribe and a new prophecy for Tzolk'in: The Mayan Calendar - Tribes & Prophecies.

It was given out by Czech Games Edition at Essen Spiel 2013.

Later it was a promotional tribe tile given away as part of the 2020 Secret Cabal Kickstarter Promo Pack.

Ek Chuah allows the player to borrow resources from the bank.
